description._content: Add a photo to a group's pool.

error._content: The photo id passed was not the id of a photo owned by the caling user.
The group id passed was not a valid id for a group the user is a member of.
The specified photo is already in the pool for the specified group.

error.message: Photo in maximum number of pools
error._content: The photo has already been added to the maximum allowed number of pools.
The user has already added the maximum amount of allowed photos to the pool.

error.message: Your Photo has been added to the Pending Queue for this Pool
error._content: The pool is moderated, and the photo has been added to the Pending Queue. If it is approved by a group administrator, it will be added to the pool.

error.message: Your Photo has already been added to the Pending Queue for this Pool
error._content: The pool is moderated, and the photo has already been added to the Pending Queue.
The content has been disallowed from the pool by the group admin(s).

error.message: Maximum number of photos in Group Pool
error._content: A group pool has reached the upper limit for the number of photos allowed.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The passed signature was invalid.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
error._content: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: photo_id
argument._content: The id of the photo to add to the group pool. The photo must belong to the calling user.

argument.name: group_id
argument._content: The NSID of the group who's pool the photo is to be added to.
